name: Rogue Ninja [Commodore 64]
description:
Prepare for Ninja Combat, as you take on the role of the Rogue Ninja in a battle for freedom.

You have been captured by the evil Master, Chow Mein, and you have been banished to the dungeons. Chow Mein threatens to keep you banished unless you pass one particular test.

Your task is to fight as many of his enemy guards as you possibly can. You have a limited number of shuriken. Some enemy guards require more than one hit. Pick up the chests to gain more shurikens. To complete your quest, you have to survive the onslaught of guards.

If you pass the test, you will be free from captivity. If however you fail, you will be banished to the underground cell and be left there to rot.

Controls:
Joystick Port 2
